titles.title: A bill to amend the Department of the Interior and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 1987 to assure the maintenance of learning opportunities at urban parks on a cost-free basis.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 3/10/1987--Introduced. Amends the Department of the Interior and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 1987 to require that no admission fee be charged for activities of significant educational or cultural value offered at urban parks.
